title: 30 typography posters that you have probably never seen before
content: A friend just sent me a link to [30 typography posters that you’ve probably never seen before](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021518/http:/www.webdesignerdepot.com/2009/09/30-typography-posters-that-youve-probably-never-seen-before/).
author: Christopher Dean

comments.content: Awesome, thanks for sharing. These are a big help to me and my BA in graphic design.

What would be of even greater help is looking into the sources of inspiration for these posters. Check out [Josef Müller-Brockmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021518/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Josef_M%C3%BCller-Brockmann) and [David Carson](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021518/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Carson). In my opinion, there’s far too many people simply emulating styles from ffffound without even knowing who they are referencing.

I’m SO tired of the “50 X you should look at” lists that now spam twitter/RSS feeds.

But this is a good one.

Sorry, most of these are not very impressive. Not a lot of ‘fresh’ typography here.

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
